<http://twitter.com/Honeywell_Aero> <http://www.youtube.com/honeywell> <https://plus.google.com/109803702550636260475> <http://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace> Direct-TO Newsletter November 2014 Issue Engine Insights – TFE731 Ignition Use <http://107.23.57.149/Pilots/Newsletters/2014/November 2014/Engine Insights>
Occasional reports from operators and Service Centers citing premature erosion or igniter plug failure indicate a possible misunderstanding of the term Continuous Ignition...
Honeywell Pilot Gateway – Android App Now Available <http://107.23.57.149/Pilots/Newsletters/2014/November%202014/Pilot%20Gateway%20App>
Honeywell's latest tool for pilots is now available on Android devices. The Pilot Gateway Android App brings native functionality to smart phones and tablets, provides notifications when new and updated resources become available, and features a built-from-scratch internal viewer....
Flight Technical Services Q&A – Operations in Non WGS-84 Airspace <http://107.23.57.149/Pilots/Newsletters/2014/November%202014/Non-WGS-84>
WGS” stands for World Geodetic System. It was developed by the U.S. Department of Defense in 1966 as a process for accurately surveying the earth and providing methods for assigning latitude, longitude, and altitude coordinates for the purposes of navigation...
Global Data Center Update – Integrated Weight & Balance and Runway Analysis <http://107.23.57.149/Pilots/Newsletters/2014/November%202014/MyGDC%20WandB>
Pilots and dispatchers can quickly and easily compute runway analysis and weight & balance reports through the GDC’s website and iPad app...
Honeywell GNS-XLS – GNS-XLS Capabilities <http://107.23.57.149/Pilots/Newsletters/2014/November%202014/GNS-XLS>
Honeywell often receives requests from customers wanting to know the capability of the GNS-XLS installed in their aircraft...
Learn More <http://goaero.honeywell.com/O0i0g8gX0200ZQqE0i0G24I>
Technical Publications, Videos, news, events, and other resources for pilots can now be found on the new Honeywell Pilot Gateway.
